author: Nivedita Karnad
comment: Worse english seen used ever to tell a news. The sentences make no sense in many of the reported news.

author: Tails
comment: Blinkfeed never shows the topics that I am subscribed to.  I have my topics set in the app, but I'm still shown news I don't care about.

reply.author: News Republic
reply.content:
Hi there, 

Thanks for your review. 

Would you mind contacting us via the app - profile - (settings) - feedback with more details concerning your issue?
Our tech team will try to resolve it.

Best,
Pallavi
NR

author: junior arevalo
comment: good app ...get it

reply.author: News Republic
reply.content:
Hi there, 

We're glad you're enjoying the app :)

We'd like to invite you to join our exclusive Users Community to get early access to new features and give us feedback. 

Please sign up here if you're interested: bit.ly/NRstore

Best,
Filza, NR

author: Cristiano Rodrigues
comment: Still no Portuguese from Portugal :(
Handy. Gives news even CNN and FOX dosnt give .

author: goldenbird12345
comment: Lol

author: Ahmed Hassan
comment: Spammy  app

author: Ab Xarbi
comment: Good for news lovers!

author: NiceGuy Nice
comment: For HTC Blinkfeed integration of News Republic it's a desaster. No news are loading, or news from feed that I deactivated are still loaded. News Republic please give up of supporting the HTC Blinkfeed, HTC is doing better without you. Please be honest and publish this. Edit: Just wrote u thru the app feedback sistem. Last update just reset the language and region and activated push notification. You are hungry for users

reply.author: News Republic
reply.content:
Hi, 

Thanks for the update. 

Our tech team will try to resolve it at the earliest.

Best,
Sid

author: Niall Macleod
comment: I'm incredibly dissapointed with the recent update. Now that I'm unable to choose my sources the app is unusable. You are bombarded with dross about the Kardashians and the only option is to manually go through and say you're not interested in the source, not that it seems to make any difference.   If it wasn't impossible to uninstall the app from my HTC it would have been long gone.

author: Sam Buxton
comment: This app is a joke! It is being controlled by government officials that remove anything they don't want you to see (ie cannabis legalisation and benefits, corruption in government and much much more!) Go on save a controversial article and watch it mysteriously disappear shortly after,  whilst shoddy articles about that skank Katie Price are left on there for indefinitely.......

reply.author: News Republic
reply.content:
Dear user,
We are a platform gathering news from internet and we are always trying to offer more comprehensive information to all users.
Could you give us more details in Feedback？
Thank you

author: Cassandra Fraley
comment: Yes there are many need sources in the app, but most of them are junk. Articles seem to be written by whoever wants to write them - might be OK for some people, but I prefer my news to come from reputable sources that fact check and edit their work.

author: Alon Kadashev
comment: If it ain't broke, why the f\_/ck break it?  This app was so good at consolidating news I cared to read about that I paid the subscription.  Now it's worse than the worst tabloid trash magazine.  All I get is fake news.  You had your chance news republic; bye bye permanently.

reply.author: News Republic
reply.content:
Hi Alon,
We are sorry to hear you are disappointed with our app's recent updates. News Republic is currently going through a testing phase. We have released the older version of our app as an alternative while we improve our app. Let us know what you love about our app at contact@news-republic.com!
Thank you for your patience!
News Republic

author: Julian Curtis
comment: I think the many recent  one star ratings seems to sum it up.  This app has fast become more intrusive and irrelevant to my preferences. And with this last update it is like a totally different app. Its just constantly spewing out irrelevant and useless shite that I have no control over.   I can't uninstall it, so will be disabling it. And won't be enabling it every now and again to see if it's any better. Shall be glad of the piece and quiet!

author: Rob Little
comment: What have you done... A brilliant app that I could select a range of interesting news sources to this junk. Can't sign in with my email. Can't select my sources rubbish spam notifications (immediately switched off)... What the hell is my subscription for... Not sure now. If only I could get a refund. I'm not sure who your are trying to appeal to but its definitely not me. Uninstall, cancel subscription

author: G Rayzz
comment: Since updating the app i don't get my 2 favorite newspapers anymore. I'm following The Independent and The Telegraph however there are no news articles at all and it's been like that for an entire week!! I feel like deleting the whole thing as what's left isn't worth reading. I shouldn't have updated the damn thing!!

author: Germaine M
comment: Was my main new aggregation app. However recent changes have turned this into click-bait gossip and opinion pieces. Unable to select news sources now so you are overloaded with fluff news and items of no interest. Important and factual journalism does not seem to be priority for this app.  Why "fix" an app that was  fully functional and customisable? Can't even select night mode now.  Poor choices have forced me to cancel my subscription

author: Juergen Kaehler
comment: Since some time the layout has change dramatically negativ! Must scroll thru many useless stuff to find something important. News are mostly outdated. The articles are full of mistakes and not background proved at all......just copied. Useless!

reply.author: News Republic
reply.content:
Hi, thanks for your feedback! We are trying to get rid of outdated news and improve the quality of news.
And please kindly tell us more details in feedback in-app.
Thank you

author: Steve Ho
comment: This new version of News Republic is lousy and I have decided to uninstall it. Previously, I liked its breaking news as my screensaver and I paid one year subscription for it to be ads free. Now this 1 year subscription which I had paid has become useless and my money wasted because the new version changed everything

author: Byron Cole
comment: The latest update really ruined this app. All it shows me is a bunch of stupid celebrity gossip and dumb news. It used to be a really good AP the way you could select your own tips to follow.

author: Shane Brennan
comment: This app is terrible. It obviously updated because it just suddenly started spamming me with absolute drivel and random nonsense articles. I have never ever opened this app apart from today to find and turn off the stupid notifications. And indirectly if the only reply you have is a copy and paste of the whole " partnership with HTC" rubbish then don't bother replying. You can't force people to use your crappy app . Edit crappy app gets more crappy with crappy enforced pop-ups with no way to turn off

reply.author: News Republic
reply.content:
Hi Shane,

Thanks for your review.

Glad you found the setting to disable notifications and sorry for the inconvenience caused.

All the best,
News Republic

author: DABLOB monsta
comment: Like many are saying, this was, not long ago, the best news app. It was the easiest to sort what I want to see and where, and most importantly, the great widget tools were very customizable and looked professional. But then.... the update. Why would you have ever even considered removing the widgets? That was the best part of this app, that had every other news app beat - but now it's useless. I'm gonna keep it installed, because it's been my favorite for a long time, and I do like a couple changes that were made, such as the comments sections....  But if I don't see these concerns addressed soon, I'm out. And that sucks.

author: Santa Clause
comment: After the update the app went sideways, no more related topics to local newspapers and above all, after getting it in the custom topic, I can't watch online posts from newspapers without twitter. Why twitter? Why doing harm on a such good app? I'll keep it on one more week and if it isn't repaired I'll uninstall, unfortunatly

author: mark fitzgibbon
comment: This is the worst update to an app I have experienced. All of my settings have been erased, yet again. This should never happen, I have better things to do in my life than constantly reset my news sources and topics.The new layout is confusing. The OLD tile layout was clear and it was easy to select topics and sources. I suggest you restore the old version of this app along with everyones previous settings until you work out how to update an app without deleting them.

author: Yves Heller
comment: I get "Internet unavailable" error message after a couple of minutes that I have the app open. Of course internet is available and I just have to restart the app. But this is extremely annoying since I have to restart the app approximately after reading two articles to fetch new ones...

author: Insomniac Chainsmoker
comment: This app is awful. Incredibly buggy. Push notifications for articles posted a day ago, poorly written and biased news sources. Just use AP, New York Times, Reuters, and WaPo and transcribe it right ffs. I don't want to read from a bunch of random small internet publications with zero journalistic integrity. Cut the BS news.

author: Jonathan Choate
comment: This app seems to pick up articles from random places and feed them to you indiscriminately. The feed is full of snake oil health advice, and partisan political articles. And not just political articles that have a perspective, the kind that use vitriolic language and weasel words from both sides. It is so hard to find any real news I have given up using it. Unfortunately, it is native to my phone and I can't delete without rooting it.

author: beverley jansen
comment: The new update changed the app completely! Instead of real news I'm getting Kardashians and weird health tips, plus local papers nothing to do with me! I spent an hour cancelling papers and blogs saying "not interested" and they are all still there. Will uninstall app.

author: gidz rate
comment: After using both the new and previous versions, I can say without any doubt, that you're after a mind numbing list of moronic magazine style articles that suffocate you with marketing and opinion, then this is for you. If you want a reader that provides hard hitting, factual, and thoughtful articles, look elsewhere.

author: Kenneth Syme
comment: Used to be a great way of getting a range of sources for news to get a range of takes on events. Now just clickbait nonsense, no matter how hard I try and change it. For some reason world news is sex in the city stars getting into a fight and reasons why aldi checkout staff scan so quickly.... Avoid.

author: Chris Bryan
comment: Last night I dreamt I could fly, unfortunately the bad guys were jealous and wanted to beat me up! Thankfully I woke up before they got to me! Oh yeah the app is good.

author: Tinus Metaal
comment: Impossible to configure on my HTC 10. I want some Dutch and some international sources. And it keeps showing sources I never selected. Very annoying.  Blinkfeed was once very nice. I can't understand how you make an app worse instead of better. Also no option to add my own sites like I can on feedly or flip board. No option to set the background colour.

reply.author: News Republic
reply.content:
Hello,
Thanks for reaching out and sorry to hear you've been unhappy with the app. Let us know the details of the issue via Feedback in-app.Here is a limitation on characters.
Thanks for your understanding,
News Republic

author: Robert Miskell
comment: This used to be my favorite news app and the only one I would ever consider referring to friends and family. Since the update though that has definitely changed. Now it is much harder to find my curated news that I care about. Additionally I am constantly being spammed by fake news that I don't want to see. It's really sad because this app used to be the best, but now it is just trash. Uninstalled.

author: magic mosshrooms
comment: If clickbait made an app it would be this rubbish. NO REAL NEWS! How hard is it to show real news? Can't even uninstall from HTC so now just a waste of memory. Embarrassing that it calls itself a news app.

author: Danielle Emond
comment: How do I get rid of this permanently? I really don't want you guys sending me click-bait garbage every day. I've turned off push notifications three times. I hate this.

author: Joe Stapp
comment: Horrible layout that is harder to navigate, widget is gone, it deleted my account so my ad-free subscription is voided, content is very weak from weak news sources. Luckily, the old app is still on my tablet. I'm deleting on my phone. Good job guys...

Until the new update you could comment without people know who you are.  They changed that to needing to know all your personal info. Will be deleting app as I can get my news from many other sources.

author: Carl Russell
comment: Keeps sending me news on unwanted subjects. Latest update spams me with trash from unreputable sources and removes useful features, such as offline viewing. I will be petitioning HTC to end their association with this awful adware.

reply.author: News Republic
reply.content:
Hi, sorry for your poor experience. We are trying our best to meet the needs of our users, could you tell us what specific sources do you like and want to add to our app, we will consider it thoroughly. Thanks
More feedback, please contact us via Feedback

author: S Richbell
comment: Hate it since update and uninstalled it. I liked the old tiled app and there's to much rubish articles on the new one with a horrible new layout which is hard to navigate and find the news you want also no options to change layout or choice of settings

reply.author: News Republic
reply.content: Dear user, sorry for your unpleasant experience. Now we are offer different channels of different topics to offer a more comprehensive contents. In addition, you can click “Not Interested” to reduce the undesired sources. Now in follow page, you can also just follow the particular sources you like and only see news from these sources. Thank 有！

author: cheyene howe
comment: Hate this app but can't get rid of it because it is pre-installed on HTC phones it's annoying, not content I want, bad grammar and no proof reading on articles. Just spams me with random stories slows down my phone and reinstalls itself every time I take it off
